name: Making the most of green and blue infrastructure - creating economic value while delivering multiple benefits
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: Sustainable cities need green and water infrastructure to be given the same importance as grey infrastructure. Research shows that green infrastructure is vital to the overall well-being of our cities and that investment in green infrastructure can deliver tangible benefits.

presentations.name: Getting the sustainability brief right
presentations.speakers: Paul Nolan, Project Director, The Mersey Forest

presentations.name: Liverpool vision - adapting the landscape, a green print for growth
presentations.speakers: Iain Taylor, Partnerships Director, Peel Holdings

presentations.name: The aesthetics of green infrastructure - creating economic value while delivering multiple benefits
presentations.speakers: Michael Vout, Urban Designer, Telford & Wrekin Council

presentations.name: What are the steps to delivery?
presentations.speakers: Glenn Gorner, Natural Environment Manager, Leeds City Council
